comment: розовый ужас сделанный из Риззы, бегает по каюте капитана

languages.text: Бойко носясь по каюте, демон то и дело хохочет или болтает с незримыми собеседниками. Некоторыми манеризмами и словечками он изрядно напоминает вам одну старую пиратку с Футфола.

Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.
languages.original_text: Бойко носясь по каюте, демон то и дело хохочет или болтает с незримыми собеседниками. Некоторыми манеризмами и словечками он изрядно напоминает вам одну старую пиратку с Футфола.

traits.locale_text: Glibly scampering about the cabin, the demon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.
Glibly scampering about the cabin, the demon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

languages.text: 这个恶魔正在船舱里肆无忌惮地窜来窜去，与看不见的同伴嬉笑打闹。它的某些举止和措辞，让你不仅想起落脚港的某个老海盗。
languages.original_text: Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

traits.locale_text: 这个恶魔正在船舱里肆无忌惮地窜来窜去，与看不见的同伴嬉笑打闹。它的某些举止和措辞，让你不仅想起落脚港的某个老海盗。

languages.text: Le démon impertinent gambade dans la cabine en ricanant et en s'adressant à des compagnons invisibles. Certaines de ses expressions ne sont pas sans vous rappeler une vieille pirate de Castel.
languages.original_text: Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Le démon impertinent gambade dans la cabine en ricanant et en s'adressant à des compagnons invisibles. Certaines de ses expressions ne sont pas sans vous rappeler une vieille pirate de Castel.

languages.text: 図々しく船室を走り回り、ディーモンはクスクス笑っては見知らぬ仲間たちとのうわさ話に花を咲かせている。その独特の身振りや言い回しには、フットフォールのある年老いた海賊をはっきりと思い起こさせるものがあった。
languages.original_text: Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

traits.locale_text: 図々しく船室を走り回り、ディーモンはクスクス笑っては見知らぬ仲間たちとのうわさ話に花を咲かせている。その独特の身振りや言い回しには、フットフォールのある年老いた海賊をはっきりと思い起こさせるものがあった。

languages.text: Recorriendo de forma impertinente el compartimento, el daemon se ríe y cotillea con compañeros a los que no puedes ver. Su forma de hablar y sus gestos te recuerdan a cierto viejo pirata de Paso.
languages.original_text: Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Recorriendo de forma impertinente el compartimento, el daemon se ríe y cotillea con compañeros a los que no puedes ver. Su forma de hablar y sus gestos te recuerdan a cierto viejo pirata de Paso.

languages.text: Der Dämon tollt unverschämt durch die Kabine, gackert und kichert und tratscht mit unsichtbaren Gefährten. Einige seiner Manierismen und Redewendungen erinnern dich an eine alte Piratenbekanntschaft von Footfall.
languages.original_text: Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.

traits.locale_text: Der Dämon tollt unverschämt durch die Kabine, gackert und kichert und tratscht mit unsichtbaren Gefährten. Einige seiner Manierismen und Redewendungen erinnern dich an eine alte Piratenbekanntschaft von Footfall.

languages.text: Kabinde kayıtsızca koşturan iblis, kıkırdayıp görünmez yoldaşlarıyla dedikodu yapıyor. Kimi davranışları ve ifade biçimleri, sana Binliman'daki ihtiyar bir korsanı hatırlatıyor.
languages.original_text: Impertinently scampering about the cabin, the daemon giggles and gossips with unseen companions. Some of its mannerisms and turns of phrase distinctly remind you of a certain old pirate from Footfall.
